availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Russell (Boyle County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Boyle County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Francis Russell. Father of Josephine Russell, Amanda J. Russell, Susan A. Russell, John E. Russell, Wallie C. Russell, George N. Russell, and Sarah Russell. Farmer in Boyle County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, p. 132.
Find A Grave, "John C. Russell (April 22, 1821-November 25, 1896)," Memorial #26452347, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/26452347 (accessed May 25, 2018).
